title: Animal study shows harmful effects of secondhand smoke even before pregnancy

title_detail.value: Animal study shows harmful effects of secondhand smoke even before pregnancy

summary: Exposure to second-hand tobacco smoke -- even before conception -- appears to have a lingering impact that can later impair the brain development of a fetus, researchers report.

summary_detail.value: Exposure to second-hand tobacco smoke -- even before conception -- appears to have a lingering impact that can later impair the brain development of a fetus, researchers report.
